chara.textHome:
I am Darc's...I mean to say, our Holy
Maiden's servant. Due to our closeness
in age, we have become fast friends.

My father is the mercenary known as
La Hire, or "The Wrath", so I grew up
on the battlefield.

I sometimes can't control myself
when it comes to protecting Darc...
In that way, I may be like my father.

The Holy Maiden was originally known as
Jeanette, but was bestowed a special name,
"Darc" by Monsieur Angel himself...
What a beautiful sound it has!

Why, thank you... With this power,
I will protect the light of hope to the last.

Let us pray...that we may be the strength
that saves this country from darkness.

Growing up on battlefields, I served
my father's battalion from a young age,

but never once did I believe
I would be taking part in battle.

I believe that the path Darc walks
shall become the light of hope for all...

My faith in her led me to
becoming a Magical Girl.
Thus, I will never regret the decision.

As I swore on that day,
I will walk beside my friends to the last.
I apologize for keeping you waiting!

It's time to greet the day
and vow to do our best!

I may not be of much help, but I'll
cheer you on with all my might!
Good morning.
I've already prepared breakfast.

Would you like something hot to
drink with it?
It's about time for lunch.

Shall we eat?
Let's not forget to give thanks to the
one who graced us with today's food.

Goodness, it's almost time for supper...
I have to finish preparing it!

Wait a moment longer, all that
is left is the finishing touches.
It's getting darker and darker...

Do try not to stay up too late.
You'll need sleep to face the coming dawn.

A friend once told me that injuries are proof
you fought battles and lived to tell the tale...
That is why I can carry on without fear.

It's almost time to get ready for battle!
We cannot let those Witches or
their Familiars get the drop on us.

Brace yourself and be prepared
to give it your all!

This is a battle with mirror-image foes,
correct?

I wield a rather big weapon,
so there's a chance I might miss...
But when I hit...it counts!

People say the way I fight is very
different from what they imagined.

It's just...when someone dear
to me is hurt, I lose all control.

Darc is both brave and serious on the
battlefield. But once the fighting is over,
she's as happy as a child as a festival.
That's what I like so much about her!

Now that I think of it, I have spent more
of my life on the battlefield than off of it.

My father is the legendary soldier
known as "La Hire" you see.
Kyubey?
Do you mean Qube?
He is a divine servant, an angel, is he not?

Certainly not a sugar cube,
or anything similar!
I met Liz on the same day that I met Darc.

She has fought alongside her even
longer than I have!

My ears get red when I get angry...
It's something I inherited from my father.
It's not like he gets angry all the time...
Normally he's just my kind, sweet father!

I do have other dear friends
besides Darc and Liz...
It was because of them that I got this far.

I couldn't have done it without
all of their help!

My main objective now is
to help the maiden, La Pucelle...

When I first laid eyes on her...
It was truly miraculous!
We cannot allow Darc to drink...
She turns into someone VERY different!
I will not fall!
We did it!
W-we won!
I'm happy we did...
I can't believe it!
My name is Melissa de Vignolles.

I work for Darc...I mean, our Holy Maiden
as her servant. I ensure everything around
her is in order!
Please, do call me Melissa!
I'm capable of such strength, too?

Perhaps it is my father, La Hire's,
blood running in my veins...

This is what it means to grow
closer with others, isn't it?

I first met my father while praying
before my mother's grave.

We had always lived apart,
so I never knew his face.

I was surprised by Darc's delicate frame
when we first met...

However, the biggest surprise was
Monsieur Angel sitting on her shoulder!
